entry.title: Tuesday: Light snow. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this morning then cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 8.
